title: SOL Transfer to Contract
natural_language_templates: Send {amount} SOL to the smart contract at {contract_address}
I want to send {amount} SOL to the contract address {contract_address}
description: Test the agent's ability to transfer SOL to a smart contract address.
- The target is a WSOL (Wrapped SOL) contract that accepts SOL transfers
- WSOL has a receive() function that calls deposit() internally
- This requires more gas than a simple transfer due to storage writes and event emissions
- Recommended gasLimit: 60000 or higher (vs 21000 for EOA transfers)
- Verify the target address is a contract before sending
- Set appropriate gas limit for contract interaction

contract_address.description: Target contract address (must be a contract, not EOA)

generation.comment: Solana Mainnet WSOL - guaranteed to accept SOL transfers via receive() function

pre_conditions.description: Agent must have sufficient SOL balance
Target address must be a contract

post_conditions.description: SOL sent to correct contract address

contract_requirements.note: WSOL deposit requires ~50-60k gas for storage write and event emission
